text: here's a really fun recipe guys it's a
puff pastry square with bacon bake those
two together and then you serve it with
a fried egg for breakfast
it's kind of fancy but really easy and
great if you want to impress some people
with your fantastic skills roll out a
piece of puff pastry so that it's about
12 inches square this is one piece of
puff pastry from a seventeen and a half
ounce container your standard sheet I'm
doing this on a piece of parchment paper
that I've floured a tiny bit trim the
edges sometimes when you roll over the
edges of puff pastry it inhibits rising
so just trim a nice clean edge and then
cut it into squares you can cut it into
thirds and then cut again into thirds
you need not you're gonna end up with
nine squares all together and do to my
precision measuring mine are exactly the
same size then what you want to do is
chill these for a few minutes before you
cook them so get them onto parchment
lined baking sheets and then chill them
for about 30 minutes once your squares
have chilled make an egg wash with one
large egg just a little bit of water to
loosen it maybe a teaspoon this egg wash
will help your puff pastry be beautiful
and shiny and golden so brush all over
this is really fun because now I'm gonna
put slices of bacon on here which would
be delicious and fantastic enough on
their own as a little snack then you fry
an egg and you put that on top take your
bacon these are nine strips of bacon cut
them in half you can use pancetta here
too if you like have your oven
preheating to 425 degrees then you lay
your bacon in sort of a cross pattern on
top of your square please bake quite hot
all right
these need to bake for about 15 to 18
minutes they need to be puffed and
golden and cooked
all right cook our eggs you can cook
them however you want I'm just gonna
cook over easy season with a little bit
of salt
perhaps I'm gonna flip these flip these
thin spatulas are great for eggs you
slide them right underneath the yolk so
it has something to support it and then
flip them over makes it really easy top
each with an egg or a fantastic fun
celebratory meal you know what I'm
having - I want to that's why
puff pastry with bacon and eggs couldn't
be more fun enjoy
you
